page.title: 09ECOLOGY
page.content: {THE LADYBIRD Did you know that the Ladybird has about ten species. It is a carnivore it eats Greenfly. The Ladybird can fly quite fast it has flap like wings. They can have two spots or more and can be yellow with twenty two spots. The black spotted Ladybird with over two spots is the most common. It has a black head with small antennae, it has very small eyes. { {THE APHID OR GREENFLY } The Aphid or Greenfly eats leaves. It's favourite kind of leaf is the Rose leaf, so it is not very popular with the owners of Rose gardens. The Greenfly is green which is what gives it it's name. It has six legs and wings that look like green lace. It is three mm long.
